sys_script_include.description: This simple script only sums 3 days to the actual date
sys_script_include.name: TodayPlus3

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d8aa89f22fb13010d8a0532a2799b65f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.TodayPlus3</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This simple script only sums 3 days to the actual date</description><name>TodayPlus3</name><script><![CDATA[var TodayPlus3 = Class.create();
TodayPlus3.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    DueDate3: function() {
        var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
        gdt.addDaysUTC(+3);
//         gs.info(gdt.getDate());
    },
    type: 'TodayPlus3'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-09 17:53:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8aa89f22fb13010d8a0532a2799b65f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TodayPlus3</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d8aa89f22fb13010d8a0532a2799b65f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-09 17:53:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
